Name: Get To Work, Succubus-Chan!
About the game: About In your dreams, a panicked succubus stumbles towards you. 'Please help me!' She begs in that sweet voice you can't refuse. 'You start help her with her job. You begin to transform your dreams to be more and more lewd. Is this just a factory for mens' 'essence'? Why is the boss posting higher and higher quotas? Will you be of any use, or will you be 'sucked' dry yourself? Features You're in a dream and this dream is a vertical shoot-em-up. Guess what the bullets do to their clothes? Put together different outfits to customize your attack patterns & special attacks! By outfits, we mean cute underwear! Collect cute bras and panties after every battle and upgrade them to enhance their abilities.
